Title: Establishes September twenty-second of each year as a day of commemoration known as Veteran Suicide Awareness and Remembrance Day
Summary: Establishes September twenty-second of each year as a day of commemoration known as Veteran Suicide Awareness and Remembrance Day.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing September twenty-second of each year as a day of commemoration known as "Veteran Suicide Awareness and Remembrance Day"
